body_html:
@GrandathePanda
Please I am having the same issue. I'm quite surprised at how its so difficult to get my loss value out of the TF Estimator object. I have asked the question on stack overflow also, still awaiting answers (https://stackoverflow.com/questions/47757772/tensorflow-how-to-get-my-loss-value-from-tf-estimaor)

Please can you let me know the work around you used?
